text:
#Cannabis use in #youth can result in a higher risk of an opioid use disorder, and can also result in cannabis-associated schizophrenia. Some still suffer from its adverse effects years later. 
#MYAVMAPP #AV411 #cancer #opioids #drugs

Find out more at: https://t.co/TGeWify5qF https://t.co/myYn6502Z4
